xwikidoc.title: Constants and variables for the Blog application
xwikidoc.content: {{velocity output="false"}} ## Blog #set($blogClassname = 'Blog.BlogClass') #set($blogTemplate = 'Blog.BlogTemplate') #set($blogSheet = 'Blog.BlogSheet') ## Blog entries #set($blogPostClassname = 'Blog.BlogPostClass') #set($blogPostTemplate = 'Blog.BlogPostTemplate') #set($blogPostSheet = 'Blog.BlogPostSheet') #set($blogPostObjectNumber = $xwiki.getDocument($blogPostTemplate).getObject($blogPostClassname).number) #set($oldArticleClassname = 'XWiki.ArticleClass') ## Categories #set($blogCategoryClassname = 'Blog.CategoryClass') #set($blogCategoryTemplate = 'Blog.CategoryTemplate') #set($blogCategorySheet = 'Blog.CategorySheet') #set($oldBlogCategoryClassname = 'Blog.Categories') #set($defaultCategoryParent = 'Blog.Categories') ## Style #set($blogStyleDocumentName = 'Blog.BlogStyle') #set($blogStyleDocument = $xwiki.getDocument($blogStyleDocumentName)) ## Clientside scripts #set($blogScriptsDocumentName = 'Blog.BlogScripts') #set($blogPublisher = $xwiki.getDocument('Blog.Publisher')) ## Misc #set($thisURL = $doc.getURL($xcontext.action, $request.queryString)) #set($isBlogPost = $doc.getObject($blogPostClassname)) ## ## ## #** * Displays an image, taken from the blog style document. * * @param $imgName The name of the icon to use (without the extension). * @param alt The alternate text that should be displayed when images are not viewable. *# #macro(toolImage $imgName $alt)[[image:path:$xwiki.getSkinFile("icons/silk/${imgName}.png")||class="icon-manage" alt="${alt}"]]#end {{/velocity}}
